text: ai eemaan laanevaalo! pratibandhon (pratigyaon, samajhauton aadi) ka poorn roop se paalan karo. tumhaare lie chaupaayon kee jaati ke jaanavar halaal hain sivaay unake jo tumhen batae ja rahen hain; lekin jab tum iharaam kee dasha mein ho to shikaar ko halaal na samajhana. nissandeh allaah jo chaahate hai, aadesh deta hai
